<Heading

  children={"Create"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/kg/embeddings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create the embedding for the IRIs for the provided query.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"embedding":{"type":"object","description":"A request to generate the embeddings.","properties":{"model":{"type":"string","default":"nomic-ai/nomic-embed-text-v1","description":"The model used to generate the embeddings."},"properties":{"type":"array","description":"The list of properties to use to generate the embeddings.","items":{"type":"string","description":"The list of properties to use to generate the embeddings."},"uniqueItems":true}},"title":"EmbeddingRequest"},"graphql_query":{"type":"string","description":"The GraphQL query used to select entities to create embedding vectors for."}},"required":["embedding","graphql_query"],"title":"KgEmbeddingRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"content":{"application/x-ndjson":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Graph Embedding Response","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The id/iri of the web page in the Graph."},"model":{"type":"string"}},"required":["id","model"],"title":"KgEmbeddingResponse"}}}},"description":"Success"},"401":{"description":"Authentication Failure"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
